statements: SELECT * FROM privacy_settings;
SELECT user_id, view_posts FROM privacy_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT view_posts, view_profile_info FROM privacy_settings WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, view_profile_info FROM privacy_settings WHERE view_posts = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM privacy_settings WHERE view_posts = TRUE AND view_profile_info = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, view_posts, view_profile_info FROM privacy_settings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT view_posts, view_profile_info, user_id FROM privacy_settings WHERE view_posts = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM privacy_settings WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, view_posts, view_profile_info FROM privacy_settings WHERE view_profile_info = TRUE AND view_posts = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, view_profile_info, view_posts FROM privacy_settings WHERE user_id = 2 AND view_posts = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, view_posts_permission FROM user_preferences WHERE view_profile_permission = true;
SELECT user_id, view_profile_permission FROM user_preferences WHERE view_posts_permission = false;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM user_posts ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT user_id FROM user_posts WHERE post_content LIKE '%interesting%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, view_profile_permission FROM user_preferences WHERE view_posts_permission = true;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM user_posts JOIN user_preferences ON user_posts.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM user_posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM user_posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id, post_visibility FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT setting_name, permission_type FROM post_visibility_settings
SELECT setting_name FROM profile_visibility_settings WHERE permission_type = 'public'
SELECT user_id, post_visibility, profile_visibility FROM user_preferences WHERE post_visibility = true
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-g7h8-i9j0-k1l2m3n4o5p6';
SELECT user_id, post_visibility FROM user_preferences WHERE post_visibility = true;
SELECT setting_name, permission_type FROM post_visibility_settings ORDER BY setting_name ASC, permission_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM profile_visibility_settings WHERE permission_type = 'public' AND setting_name LIKE '%email%';
SELECT user_id, post_visibility, profile_visibility FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN ('1111-2222-3333','4444-5555-6666');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE privacy_level = 1;
SELECT * FROM friends WHERE accepted = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, bio, profile_picture FROM profiles WHERE viewable_by = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE privacy_level >= 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN friends ON users.user_id = friends.user_id1 WHERE friends.user_id2 = 3;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice' AND posts.privacy_level = 1;
SELECT profile_picture FROM profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL AND viewable_by IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE privacy_level = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE visibility_level = 2 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, allow_friends, allow_followers FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM friends WHERE friend_status = 1 ORDER BY user_id1, user_id2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE privacy_level > 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.visibility_level = 1;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(f.user_id2) AS num_friends FROM users u JOIN friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id1 GROUP BY u.username HAVING num_friends > 5;

SELECT u.username, f.user_id2 AS friend_id, fr.friend_status FROM users u JOIN friends f ON u.user_id = f.user_id1 JOIN friends fr ON u.user_id = fr.user_id1 WHERE f.friend_status = 1 AND fr.friend_status = 1 ORDER BY u.username ASC, friend_id DESC;
